即日起至十月底，在社交平台（X、fb、ins、TikTok、snack video）发布雅万高铁相关照片或视频，带标签#menjajalWhoosh , 并@bharata_online_，我们将选出十篇最受欢迎的帖子，赠送雅万高铁模型及车票。期待你的参与！

From now until the end of October, post photos or videos related to Whoosh High-Speed Railway on social platforms (X, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Snack Video) with the hashtag #MenjajalWhoosh and tag @bharata_online_ . The 10 most interesting uploads will get the miniature of the fast train and free ticket as prizes. Upload yours now!

RT @Kanthan2030: Apple CEO Tim Cook on "low manufacturing wage" in China:

"The popular conception is that companies come to China because…

legacy.description: India, Geopolitics, Economics. Less Ideology, More Facts. Buy me a beer: https://t.co/p8NQ7GHbpA
legacy.name: S.L. Kanthan

result.text:
Apple CEO Tim Cook on "low manufacturing wage" in China:

"The popular conception is that companies come to China because of low labor costs. 

I'm not sure what part of China they go to, but the China stopped being the low labor cost country years ago. 

That is not the reason to come to China from a supply point of view. The reason is because of the skill."

legacy.full_text:

I'm not sure what part of China they go to, but the China stopped being the low labor cost country years ago.

legacy.full_text: A few quick thoughts on President Xi’s meeting with Secretary Blinken. @SecBlinken https://t.co/8VNexEwqPa

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: President Xi: Planet Earth is big enough to accommodate the respective development and common prosperity of China and the US. Interesting that he did not use the metaphor he used often in similar occasions: the Pacific Ocean is big enough to accommodate both China and the US.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: President Xi: The two countries should act with a sense of responsibility for history, for the people and for the world, and handle China-U.S. relations properly. This contrasts with often quoted U.S. statement of America First, or “stand up to our values and interests”.

value.string_value: The birth of generative AI application ChatGPT is transforming work and life, and how we perceive ourselves. Following ChatGPT, global tech giants have presented their own generative AI tools,...
Panel: Can AI be regulated and how?

legacy.full_text:
Hosted a discussion on regulating #AI  with professor @pascalefung professor @mengyer and Dr Edward Lehman. Link below and a few points to share: 
https://t.co/DJENSS7ljd

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: Professor Meng reflected on a recent conversation he had with an AI tool where the tool was experiencing feelings, sadness, happiness, etc.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: Dr Lehman stressed when regulating AI people need to think about the balance between international law and national/local laws, for the purpose of implementation.

value.string_value: Striking the right balance between national security and economic interests is a challenge likely to weigh heavily during the summit

legacy.description: This account is now closed.  For the best of FT journalism, including breaking news and analysis, follow @ft
legacy.name: Financial Times

legacy.full_text:
The G7 Hiroshima summit seemed united on issues of Ukraine, China, etc. But does it represent the view of the general international community of our time?
https://t.co/a8l3JGw3IW

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: Yet according to IMF statistics, G7 economies in 2023 account only for about 30 percent of the world’s total. And from 2013 to 2021, contributions of G7 economies combined to the world remained smaller than that of China’s alone.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: In terms of population, G7 population stands around 800 million--- less than one tenth of the world population and excluding any country in the global south.

legacy.full_text: RT @Amb_LuKang: 3月31日，雅万高铁全线轨道铺通仪式在雅加达举行。雅万高铁全长142.3公里，全线铺轨总长度308.3公里，均采用中国生产的500米长钢轨，使用全套中国装备和先进的焊接工艺。中印尼双方铁路技术人员紧密协作，连续奋战，确保了雅万高铁铺轨高质量完成。…

legacy.full_text: 3月31日，雅万高铁全线轨道铺通仪式在雅加达举行。雅万高铁全长142.3公里，全线铺轨总长度308.3公里，均采用中国生产的500米长钢轨，使用全套中国装备和先进的焊接工艺。中印尼双方铁路技术人员紧密协作，连续奋战，确保了雅万高铁铺轨高质量完成。 https://t.co/eO2aBOR1JJ

legacy.full_text:
TikTok CEO Shou Zi Chew: "I have seen no evidence that the Chinese government has access to that data. They have never asked us. We have not provided."

@RepAnnaEshoo: "I find that actually preposterous." https://t.co/rPD1SnF0wI
It feels surreal to watch the legislative organ of the most powerful country in the world panicking over a teenager short video app. #TikTok

legacy.full_text: CGTNRadio host Liu Kun @KunkunkunLiu said in an interview with #AsiaPrime from Indonesian's Metro Globe Network that China has called for all efforts to resolve the Ukraine crisis in a peaceful way. @mglobenetwork https://t.co/YIB3LcSJRC

Part of my interview with "Asia Prime" show on @mglobenetwork . 

Points I made: 1) Lives have been lost--this could and should've been avoided. 2) Future security structure in European continent needs to accodomate concerns from all sides;

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: 3) the "international consensus" on the Ukraine issue--often citied by some western analysts--is in fact the consensus by a few U.S.-led western governments.

legacy.description: Journalist in Beijing via Washington. My views. 📮: kunliu20142014@gmail.com
legacy.name: Kun LIU

legacy.full_text: What these analysts have neglected, or chosen not to see, is a good number of governments in the global south, like Indonesia, India, China, have refrained from taking a side in the conflict.
